description.value: A user should be able to remove a button group.
A user should be able to save a Button Group edit form without inputting data into any required field.
A user should be able to duplicate a Button Group content type. Verify on Stage amd Storefront.

comment.userInput: Validate content type is enabled after save
Validate content type is enabled in Storefront

title.value: Button Group - Validate Advanced Configuration Default Values

description.value: Validate the default values for every attribute in the Advanced Configuration form and on Stage for a Button group.

title.value: Button Group - Update Advanced Configuration Values

description.value: Validate that updating every attribute in the Advanced Configuration form for a Button group will update the Stage and Storefront correctly.

title.value: Button Group - No More Old Add Button Button

description.value: The old add button button should be gone on button group hover.

comment.userInput: Validate Don't See Old Add Button

title.value: Button Group - Validate Appearance Default Values

description.value: Validate the default values for every attribute for Appearance in the Configuration form, on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.
Validate the Inline Appearance in the Configuration form, on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.
Validate the Stacked Appearance in the Configuration form, on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.

title.value: Button Group - Validate Inline Appearance Add Button

description.value: Validate the add button and Inline Appearance in the Configuration form, on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.

title.value: Button Group - Validate Stacked Appearance Add Button

description.value: Validate the add button and Stacked Appearance in the Configuration form, on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.

title.value: Button Group - Validate Inline Appearance Move Button

description.value: Validate moving a button and Inline Appearance in the Configuration form, on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.

title.value: Button Group - Validate Stacked Appearance Move Button

description.value: Validate moving a button and Stacked Appearance in the Configuration form, on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.
Validate switching between appearances in the Configuration form, on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.

title.value: Button Group - Validate Inline Appearance Long Name Wrap

description.value: Validate that buttons wrap when one gets long name with Inline Appearance on Stage and Storefront for a Button group.

title.value: Button Group - Cannot add Buttons to Stage

description.value: If user drags Buttons to Stage, it should have no effect

title.value: Button Group - Add Buttons to Column container and view on Admin and Storefront

description.value: As a Content Manager I want column to be a container so that I can add Buttons inside

comment.userInput: User sees Buttons displayed in column on Stage
View Buttons inside column on storefront

description.value: Button Group - Button is shown by default in stage and storefront

Stage: Validate Default Show/Hide State - After Save

title.value: Button Group - Buttons has hide show capabilities

description.value: A user is able to hide and show the buttons successfully

comment.userInput: Validate content type remains disabled after save

Set content to visible in admin
